mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY(P_ID, P_MER, MB_ID, P_DATE, EXH_TITLE, BUYER, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_TEL, AMOUNT, EXH_NO, EXH_THUMBNAIL, CB_ID) VALUES( #{p_id}, #{p_mer}, #{mb_id}, #{p_date}, #{exh_title}, #{buyer}, #{buyer_email}, #{buyer_tel}, #{amount}, #{exh_no}, #{exh_thumbnail}, #{cb_id})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*,e.exh_st_date FROM PAY P, MEMBER MB, exhibition e WHERE 1=1 AND buyer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND buyer_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND P.MB_ID=MB.MB_ID AND P.MB_ID = #{mb_id} AND p.EXH_NO = e.EXH_NO ORDER BY P_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM PAY P, EXHIBITION E WHERE 1=1 AND buyer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND buyer_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p.EXH_NO = e.EXH_NO ORDER BY P_DATE DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT Count(*) FROM PAY WHERE 1=1 AND buyer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND buyer_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT *, COUNT(p.P_ID)AS rank_cnt from exhibition as e LEFT outer JOIN pay AS p on e.exh_no= p.exh_no WHERE 1=1 AND e.EXH_APPROVAL=1 AND e.EXH_ST_DATE >= NOW() GROUP BY e.exh_no ORDER BY rank_cnt DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT SUM(rank_cnt)FROM( SELECT e.*, COUNT(p.P_ID)AS rank_cnt from exhibition as e LEFT outer JOIN pay AS p on e.exh_no= p.exh_no WHERE 1=1 AND e.EXH_APPROVAL=1 AND e.EXH_ST_DATE >= NOW() GROUP BY e.exh_no )a;
